channel.title: Comments on: SOX Audit tool for Notes and Domino

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@1 and @2 - Thanks for the heads up, you can probably tell I don't use IE any more. This was due to a link in my del.icio.us tags being too long. I have moved it off the front page and all seems to be OK now.<br/><br/><br/><br/>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
@1 and @2 – Thanks for the heads up, you can probably tell I don’t use IE any more. This was due to a link in my del.icio.us tags being too long. I have moved it off the front page and all seems to be OK now.

Matt

item.title: By: Vitor Pereira
item.dc:creator: Vitor Pereira
item.description: <p>@1 - Fiona</p><p>I believe it only happens with internet explorer.</p>
item.content:encoded:
@1 – Fiona

I believe it only happens with internet explorer.

item.title: By: Fiona
item.dc:creator: Fiona
item.description: <p>Matthew, <br/><br/><br/><br/>quick technical point. When I log onto this site at the mo, each of your entries is partially obscured by the ads. Is this ust my computer?</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matthew,

quick technical point. When I log onto this site at the mo, each of your entries is partially obscured by the ads. Is this ust my computer?
